properties.value: Cakes are a type of food that can be obtained by baking an uncooked cake on a cooking range, requiring level 40 Cooking and granting 180 experience when successful. Players may burn the cake while baking one, resulting in a burnt cake; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 74 on ranges.

SMW Subobject for SliceHigh Alchemy value: 6Examine: I'd rather have a whole cake.Is members only: falseIs variant of: CakeUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Slice of cake.pngWeight: 0.100Value: 10Version anchor: SliceRelease date: 11 June 2001Item ID: 1895

Cakes are a type of food that can be obtained by baking an uncooked cake on a cooking range, requiring level 40 Cooking and granting 180 experience when successful. Players may burn the cake while baking one, resulting in a burnt cake; the burn rate while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at Cooking level 74 on ranges.

A cake has 3 servings, each healing 4 Hitpoints, for a total of 12 Hitpoints healed. It is useful for players with low-level Hitpoints training Thieving or Agility. Eating a serving of cake makes a 2/3 cake and eating that makes a slice of cake.

There are 2 item spawns of slice of cake on Moss Giant Island. With 5 Thieving, cake can be stolen from Ardougne Baker's Stall., Keldagrim's Best Bread, Kourend Castle Baker's Stall., and Nathifa's Bake Stall. They can also be purchased from those bakery stalls, Prifddinas Foodstuffs, or Lletya Food Store.

'''Cakes''' are a type of [[food]] that can be obtained by baking an [[uncooked cake]] on a [[cooking range]], requiring level 40 [[Cooking]] and granting 180 experience when successful. Players may burn the cake while baking one, resulting in a [[burnt cake]]; the [[burn rate]] while cooking these will decrease as players reach higher Cooking levels. It will stop burning entirely at [[Cooking]] level 74 on ranges.

A cake has 3 servings, each healing 4 [[Hitpoints]], for a total of 12 Hitpoints healed. It is useful for players with low-level Hitpoints training [[Thieving]] or [[Agility]]. Eating a serving of cake makes a 2/3 cake and eating that makes a slice of cake.

There are 2 item spawns of slice of cake on [[Moss Giant Island]]. With 5 [[Thieving]], cake can be stolen from [[Ardougne Baker's Stall.]], [[Keldagrim's Best Bread]], [[Kourend Castle Baker's Stall.]], and [[Nathifa's Bake Stall.]] They can also be purchased from those [[bakery stall]]s, [[Prifddinas Foodstuffs]], or [[Lletya Food Store]].
